credit_line: Gift of Brighton Art Gallery and Museum
title: Border
provenance: Unused length from the Royal Pavilion, Brighton.
description: Yellow bamboo shaded with brown. A series of coupled strips connected to one another at right angles by smaller widely spaced bamboo strips. Two complete borders to the width. Excise stamp on back has legend encircling crown: "First Account Taken - 313 (?)"
name: Border
